title: Mithril pickaxe

properties.name: description
properties.value: The mithril pickaxe is a pickaxe that is stronger than the black pickaxe, but weaker than the adamant pickaxe. It requires an Attack level of 20 to wield, and a Mining level of 21 to mine with. It can be used in combat or in mining to mine rocks. It is also one of the lightest pickaxes in the game, making it ideal for activities such as training Runecraft via the Abyss.

Item ID1273

The mithril pickaxe is a pickaxe that is stronger than the black pickaxe, but weaker than the adamant pickaxe. It requires an Attack level of 20 to wield, and a Mining level of 21 to mine with. It can be used in combat or in mining to mine rocks. It is also one of the lightest pickaxes in the game, making it ideal for activities such as training Runecraft via the Abyss.

[[File:Mithril pickaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''mithril pickaxe''' is a [[pickaxe]] that is stronger than the [[black pickaxe]], but weaker than the [[adamant pickaxe]]. It requires an [[Attack]] level of 20 to wield, and a [[Mining]] level of 21 to mine with. It can be used in combat or in mining to mine rocks. It is also one of the lightest pickaxes in the game, making it ideal for activities such as training [[Runecraft]] via the Abyss.
